enb_long_title: Twenty-sixth sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies (SB 26) of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
sentences: JAPAN emphasized the need to avoid duplicating activities and the US said there was a more logical sequence of tasks than that set out in the Secretariat's report ( FCCC/SBI/2007/5 ).
Crispin d'Auvergne (Saint Lucia) and Helmut Hojesky (Austria) will hold informal consultations.
